so_47808338: n=60 # number of days
ref="/tmp/$$.tmp" # temporary filename

touch -t $(date -d "-$n days" '+%Y%m%d%H%M.%S') "$ref"

for f in /path/tomy/directory/*.rpt; do
   [[ -f $f && $ref -nt $f ]] && echo rm "$f"
done

rm "$ref"
